DataElement.preferredName: Background Tissue Standardized Uptake Value Mean Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates the background standard uptake value mean.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Background Tissue Standardized Uptake Value Mean
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Existing conditions, especially those that would be confused with the phenomenon to be observed or measured._An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function._An effectively dimensionless measure of regional tracer uptake calculated as the activity concentration within a 2D region of interest (ROI) or 3D volume of interest (VOI) measured on a PET image (nCi1mL) / [injected dose (nCi) / body weight (g)]._The sum of a set of values divided by the number of values in the set.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Existing conditions, especially those that would be confused with the phenomenon to be observed or measured.:An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.

Concepts.definition: Existing conditions, especially those that would be confused with the phenomenon to be observed or measured.
An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.

Property.preferredDefinition: An effectively dimensionless measure of regional tracer uptake calculated as the activity concentration within a 2D region of interest (ROI) or 3D volume of interest (VOI) measured on a PET image (nCi1mL) / [injected dose (nCi) / body weight (g)].:The sum of a set of values divided by the number of values in the set.

Concepts.definition: An effectively dimensionless measure of regional tracer uptake calculated as the activity concentration within a 2D region of interest (ROI) or 3D volume of interest (VOI) measured on a PET image (nCi1mL) / [injected dose (nCi) / body weight (g)].
The sum of a set of values divided by the number of values in the set.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.origin: DCI CRF:  Duke Cancer Institute Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent a standardized uptake ratio value generated during a positron emission tomography scan.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

DataElement.origin: DCI CRF:  Duke Cancer Institute Case Report Form
DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support RAVE Brain study_ghd
